dublin_core.dcvalue: New technologies for drug identification traceability and mobile platforms make it possible to personalise the services provided to consumers of medicine This paper presents the Health Identity platform a mobile application which gives consumers the assurance that the drug they have in their hands is a genuine product and can be consumed without risk according to their stored patient profile allergies health state current medication etc
Studies in health technology and informatics
Health-Identity: mobile services for consumers of medicines.
